name: Steam Next Fest - Ael'dethi Prowler
description:
These great panthers haunt the frozen ridges of the Ael’deth peaks. Among the Eldrin, stories of their hunts are told to keep the young from wandering too high up the mountains.

Unlocked by Completing a +5 Dungeon during Steam Next Fest 2025.

name: Arc Games Gift - Arcalian Steed
description:
A sleek black horse crowned with a crimson mane, bred for both majesty and endurance.

Unlocked by creating an Arc Games profile.

name: Twitch Drop - Observer's Platemail
description:
Forged for tacticians who see beyond the fray. One eye fixed upon the enemy in front, the other lifted to the horizon. Observers are revered for their strategic command and unerring foresight in battle.

Unlocked by Twitch Drop

name: Twitch Drop - Seeker's Remnants
description:
Seekers forever wander in pursuit of the hidden realm of the fae. Some search the heart of the Wyrdwoods for secret passages, while others believe the path lies in the rays of sunlight filtering through the trees of ordinary forests.

Unlocked by Twitch Drop

name: Twitch Drop - Skygazer's Regalia
description:
Across the skies, great winged beasts circle the world below. To look upward is to survive their hunts, yet the Skygazer lifts his eyes not in fear, but in pursuit.

Unlocked by Twitch Drop

name: Twitch Drop - Scryer's Warhorse
description:
Conjured by diviners who serve the realm’s elite, these spectral steeds embody silent authority. Rarely seen beyond the high courts, they remind all that the eyes of a scryer are always watching.

Unlocked by Twitch Drop
